wikipedia_page.main: David John King (24 October 1940 – 16 July 2010) was an English professional footballer who played as an inside forward in the Football League for Hull City, and in non-League football for King's Lynn.

response: David or Dave King may refer to:
*Dave King (actor) (1929–2002), English comedian, actor and vocalist
*Dave King (Irish singer) (born 1961), Irish vocalist, member of the band Flogging Molly
*Dave King (ice hockey) (born 1947), Canadian professional ice hockey coach
*Dave King (businessman) (born 1955), Scottish businessman, Rangers F.C. director
*Dave King (artist) (1948–2019), British graphic designer and artist
